item.title: CVE-2024-22293|2024-01-31T17:33:39.352Z -- andrea%20tarantini -- bp%20profile%20search
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Andrea Tarantini BP Profile Search allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects BP Profile Search: from n/a through 5.5.
